author: dan131riley
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes several uninitialized variable uses reported by valgrind.  Most of these are in DataFormats, where the use of the uninitialized variables was reported in the output module.

#### PR validation:

Trivial technical fix, no physics or computational performance changes expected.  A limited matrix test found no unexpected failures.
title: Fixes for uninitialized variable use detected by valgrind
